items.title: Pro-Russian Blogger Released Video Of Kremlin Shooting Down Santa
items.description: A pro-Kremlin bloggers released a video on the Telegram social messaging app on Friday that showed Santa Claus being shot down over Moscow!

items.title: The Dyson WashG1 Is The Ultimate Holiday Helper
